**Instructions for playing on Smart TV:Copy the entire folder i.e., Elysium (2013) onto ur pendrive.Navigate to the Video in the folder and press Play.The English subtitles will be automatically displayed.You can also use Chapters.For other subtitles, for example to view spanish subs, in the elysium folder on ur pendrive replace the English subs(the one outside the other subs folder) with Spanish subs from the other subs folder and rename Spanish srt file to 'Elysium(2013).BrRip.ArianFX' .

**Instructions for playing on Tablets and smartphones:Copy the entire folder i.e., Elysium (2013) onto ur device's memory or external sd card.Go to ur video /Gallery section where u will find Elysium (2013) and play it.The subtitles automatically appear.For other subtitles, for example to view spanish subs, in the elysium folder on ur sd card replace the English subs(the one outside the other subs folder) with Spanish subs from the other subs folder and rename Spanish srt file to 'Elysium(2013).BrRip.ArianFX' .
